segments.text: I can't help but feel a pang watching this unfolding in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed in drying her plate, oblivious to everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is flowing endlessly from the faucet, filling the sink to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling over, soaking the cabinets and pooling on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the water, and it just seems so careless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on that shaky stool is reaching for cookies, too high up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It breaks my heart thinking he might fall any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below is expectant, but this could end badly for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sneaking treats without her knowing, which feels a bit lonely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is serene, but inside it's all potential trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked neatly, yet the water threatens to ruin it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would notice and step in before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene just tugs at me, full of unnoticed risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a peaceful world, so different from here.
segments.speaker: PAR
